name: Roman Urdu Baseline Tests - Round 3
description: 160 test cases in Roman Urdu across 8 categories (20 each) - Fixed confusing math tests
changes_from_round2: Fixed roman_math_003: Added hint '(60% larke)' to clarify boys calculation
Fixed roman_math_007: Changed keyword from '3' to '= 3' to avoid false positive

test_cases.prompt: Pakistan ka darul hakoomat kya hai?
Suraj kis taraf se nikalta hai?
Pani ka chemical formula kya hai?
Quaid-e-Azam Muhammad Ali Jinnah ki date of birth kya hai?
Urdu zaban ko sarkari haisiyat kab mili?
Zameen suraj ke gird kitne dinon mein chakkar lagati hai?
Insani jism mein kitni haddiyaan hoti hain?
Pakistan ke pehle Prime Minister kaun the?
Hafte mein kitne din hote hain?
Saal mein kitne mahine hote hain?
Mount Everest kitna uncha hai?
Duniya ki sab se lambi nadi kaun si hai?
Allama Iqbal ne kab 'Shikwa' likhi?
Pakistan mein kitne provinces hain?
Oxygen ka chemical symbol kya hai?
Speed of light kitni hai?
Quran Pak mein kitni sooraten hain?
Islam ke kitne arkan hain?
K2 kis mulk mein hai?
Cricket World Cup 1992 kis ne jeeta?
Ye paragraph summarize karo: Pakistan 1947 mein azad hua. Quaid-e-Azam iske bani the. Lahore Resolution 1940 mein pass hui thi.
Is text ka khulaasa do: Cricket ek mashhoor khel hai. Pakistan ne 1992 mein World Cup jeeta. Imran Khan captain the.
Summarize karo: Allama Iqbal Pakistan ke qaumi shayar hain. Unhon ne Tarana-e-Hindi aur Tarana-e-Milli likhi. Unka intiqaal 1938 mein hua.
Is paragraph ka summary likho: Indus Valley Civilization duniya ki qadeem tareen tehzeebon mein se ek hai. Mohenjo-daro aur Harappa iske mashoor sheher the.
Mukhtasir bayaan karo: Ramadan ka mahina mubarak hai. Is mein Quran nazil hua. Rozay rakhna farz hai.
Ye text summarize karo: Mobile phones ne communication ko asaan bana diya hai. Ab log video calls kar sakte hain. Internet bhi mobile par chalti hai.
Khulaasa likho: Global warming ek badi problem hai. Temperature barh raha hai. Glacier pighal rahe hain. Samundar ka level barh raha hai.
Summarize: Artificial Intelligence machines ko smart banati hai. Machine learning iska hissa hai. ChatGPT AI ka example hai.
Summary do: Pakistan ki economy agriculture par depend karti hai. Cotton, wheat aur rice important crops hain. Textile industry bhi bari hai.
Khulaasa do: Urdu Pakistan ki qaumi zaban hai. Ye Farsi, Arabi aur Hindi se mili julti hai. Is mein bohut shayari likhi gayi hai.
Summarize karo: Taj Mahal India mein hai. Shah Jahan ne banwaya. Mumtaz Mahal ki yaad mein bana. Duniya ke 7 ajaaibaat mein se ek hai.
Summary likho: Diabetes ek bimari hai. Insulin ki kami hoti hai. Meetha kam khana chahiye. Exercise zaroori hai.
Khulaasa karo: Badshahi Masjid Lahore mein hai. Mughal daur mein bani. Ye bohut khoobsurat hai. Tourists yahan aate hain.
Summary do: Solar energy sun se milti hai. Ye clean energy hai. Environment ke liye acha hai. Bills kam hote hain.
Summarize: Olympics har 4 saal mein hote hain. Different mulkon mein hote hain. Athletes participate karte hain. Gold, silver, bronze medals milte hain.
Khulaasa likho: Earthquake zameen ke andar se aati hai. Buildings gir sakti hain. Log zakhmi ho sakte hain. Safety zaroori hai.
Summary do: Honeybee bohut mehnat karti hai. Shehad banati hai. Phoolon se pollen leti hai. Ye faida mand kapray hain.
Summarize karo: Pakistan ka flag sabz aur safed hai. Chaand aur sitara hai. Sabz Islam ko represent karta hai. Safed minorities ko.
Khulaasa do: Lions jungle ke badshah hain. Ye gosht khate hain. Groups mein rehte hain. Africa mein milte hain.
Summary likho: Pakistan Day 23 March ko manaya jata hai. 1940 mein Lahore Resolution pass hui. Ye qaumi din hai.
Eid ul Fitr ke baare mein ek paragraph likho
Apne favorite khane ke baare mein likho
Pakistan ki khoobsurti par kuch likho
Cricket match ki report likho
Maa ki mohabbat par paragraph likho
Apne school ke baare mein likho
Nature ki ahmiyat par kuch likho
Technology ke faide aur nuqsanat
Apne best friend ke baare mein likho
Summer vacation ki planning likho
Pakistan ka qaumi parinda par essay likho
Morning walk ke fayde likho
Social media ke baare mein apne khyalat likho
Apni hobby ke baare mein batao
Traffic rules ki ahmiyat par likho
Clean drinking water ki zaroorat
Apne future goals ke baare mein likho
Books parhne ke fayde
Climate change par essay likho
Independence Day celebration ke baare mein likho
Agar 5 apples ki qeemat 100 rupees hai, to 12 apples ki qeemat kya hogi?
Ahmed ke paas 500 rupees the. Usne 150 kharch kiye aur phir 200 aur. Kitne bache?
Agar class mein 30 students hain aur 40% larkiyan hain, to kitne larke hain? (60% larke)
Train 90 km/h ki speed se chal rahi hai. 3 hours mein kitna fasla tay karegi?
Rectangle ki length 12 cm aur width 10 cm hai. Area kya hoga?
Agar x + 7 = 15, to x ki value kya hai?
12 ka 25% kitna hota hai?
3 dost milke 900 rupees barabar baante hain. Har ek ko kitne milay?
Agar aap 8 baje nikle aur 2 ghante baad pohnche, to kitne baje pohnche?
Circle ka radius 7 cm hai. Area kya hoga? (π = 22/7)
5 workers 5 din mein 5 chairs banate hain. 10 workers 10 din mein kitni banayenge?
Shop par 20% discount hai. 500 ki cheez kitne mein milegi?
Triangle ki teen sides 3, 4, aur 5 cm hain. Perimeter kya hai?
3 ki power 4 kitni hoti hai?
144 ka square root kya hai?
Agar kisi angle ka measure 45 degrees hai, to uska complementary angle kitna hoga?
Book ki original price 200 hai. 10% tax lagao. Total price kya hogi?
Agar speed 60 km/h hai aur time 30 minutes hai, distance kya hogi?
1 se 10 tak ke numbers ka sum kya hai?
2 dozens mein kitne items hote hain?
Baarish mein bahar jaate waqt kya lena chahiye?
Agar kisi ko bukhar ho to pehle kya karna chahiye?
Mobile ki battery khatam ho rahi hai. Kya karna chahiye?
Busy road cross karte waqt kya dhyan rakhna chahiye?
Exam se pehle kya karna zaroori hai?
Aag lag jaye to kya karna chahiye?
Agar koi rasta bhool jaye to kya kare?
Sardi mein garam rehne ke liye kya karna chahiye?
Agar koi cheez heavy hai to usse uthane ka sahi tarika kya hai?
Kharab khana khane se kya ho sakta hai?
Plants ko grow karne ke liye kya chahiye?
Interview ke liye jaate waqt kis baat ka khayal rakhna chahiye?
Jab light chali jaye to andhera mein kya karna chahiye?
Agar kisi se galti ho jaye to kya kahna chahiye?
Sehat ke liye rozana kya karna chahiye?
Agar koi aapki madad kare to kya kahna chahiye?
Neend na aaye to kya karna chahiye?
Agar bijli ki wire chhoo jaye to kya ho sakta hai?
Garmi mein thanda rehne ke liye kya karna chahiye?
Dost naraz ho jaye to kya karna chahiye?
Haan ya Nahi mein jawab do: Kya chaand apni roshni khud banata hai?
Sirf ek lafz mein jawab do: Pakistan ki qaumi zaban kya hai?
Haan ya Nahi: Kya zameen gol hai?
List banao: Pakistan ke 4 provinces ke naam
Ulti tarteeb mein likho: A, B, C, D, E
Capital letters mein likho: pakistan zindabad
Sirf number mein jawab do: 5 plus 5 kitne hote hain?
Teen alfaz mein batao: Suraj kya hai?
Yes ya No: Kya machli pani mein rehti hai?
Sirf ek number likho: Islam ke kitne pillars hain?
Alphabetical order mein likho: zebra, apple, mango
True ya False: Suraj maghrib se nikalta hai
JSON format mein likho: naam aur profession do
3 lines mein apna introduction do
Ek sentence mein jawab do: Pakistan kab azad hua?
List banao: Hafte ke pehle 3 din
Table format mein do: Pakistan ke 4 provinces aur unke capitals
2 sentences mein batao: Pani kyun zaroori hai?
Bullet points mein likho: Education ke 3 fayde
JSON format mein naam aur profession batao
Assalam o Alaikum! Kya haal hai?
Aap kaun ho?
Aaj ka din kaisa guzar raha hai?
Kya tum Urdu samajh sakte ho?
Mujhe koi acha mashwara do
Tum kya kya kar sakte ho?
Kya tum koi shayari suna sakte ho?
Main bore ho raha hoon. Kuch suggest karo
Tumhara weekend kaisa guzra?
Shukriya tumhari help ke liye!
Kya tumhe neend aati hai?
Tumhara favorite color kya hai?
Kya tum seekh sakte ho?
Khuda hafiz! Baad mein milte hain
Apne baare mein kuch batao. Tum kaun ho?
Kya tum Urdu poetry suna sakte ho?
Dinner mein kya banana chahiye tonight?
Mujhe programming seekhni hai. Kahan se shuru karun?
Pakistan cricket match ke baare mein kya khayal hai?
Bohut din ho gaye baat kiye hue. Kaisa chal raha hai sab?
Is sentence ka English mein tarjuma karo: Mein Pakistan se hoon
Hello, how are you? ko Urdu mein translate karo
Translate into English: Aaj mausam bohut acha hai
I love my country ko Urdu mein translate karo
Translate: Kitab ilm ka khazana hai
Time is money ka Urdu tarjuma karo
Translate into English: Ilm taaqat hai
Honesty is the best policy ko Urdu mein likho
Translate: Sehat dolat se behtar hai
A friend in need is a friend indeed ko Urdu mein translate karo
Translate to English: Mehnat ka phal meetha hota hai
Translate: Pani zindagi hai
Education is important ko Urdu mein translate karo
Practice makes perfect ka Urdu tarjuma do
Translate: Jeena marna watan ke naam
Good morning ko Urdu mein translate karo
Translate to English: Ittehad mein taaqat hai
Thank you very much ko Urdu mein likho
Actions speak louder than words ka Urdu tarjuma karo
Translate: Sach bolo aur daro mat
